couldnotfindos: We couldn't find your OS or Location, and the filter option has been disabled
UserAgentheadline: Imitate another device, operating system and browser
UserAgentSwitcher6: This is how it would look with a successful installation of the user agent switcher.
UserAgentSwitcher8: Now click on the icon indicated with red.
UserAgentSwitcher10: Then a bigger window will pop-up in this new window there is a dropdown menu.
UserAgentSwitcher12: Click the dropdown menu and choose a device/Operating system/Browser.
UserAgentSwitcher14: This is how it looks when it has changed your user agent string.
UserAgentdevtool6: Click on the three dotted menu in the upper right corner.
UserAgentdevtool8: Hover over more tools and then click on developer tools.
UserAgentdevtool10: Now click the three dotted menu in the developer tools window.
UserAgentdevtool12: Hover over more tools and click on network conditions.
UserAgentdevtool14: Now in the bottom of the screen in the developer tools window we have a tap called Network conditions.
UserAgentdevtool15: Here is a checkbox called select automatically.
UserAgentdevtool18: Now you get the option to change the user agent to what ever you want in the custom dropdown menu.
Deletecookie4: Go to upper right corner of the window and click on the button with 3 dots.
Deletecookie7: Now click on Settings to get to the settings menu.
Deletecookie9: When in the setting menu scroll down to the bottom of the page here are you going to find a button called advanced.
Deletecookie10: Click the advanced button marked with red.
Deletecookie12: The next section of settings options is called Privacy and security.
Deletecookie13: In this section you are going to find the Clear Browsing Data button indicated with red. Click that button.
Deletecookie15: Now a new window has popped up, in this window it is possible to delete ones browsing history, cookies and cached images/files.
Deletecookie16: To be sure that you don't have any cookies that can affect the result of your query/searches we select the dropdown menu and set it to All time, indicated en green.
Deletecookie17: Then set a check mark in the box called cookies and other site data marked with red.
Deletecookie18: If the other boxes are marked you can uncheck them if you want, they are not relevant for what we are trying to accomplish.
Deletecookie19: The last thing to do is to click the clear data button marked with yellow.
VPN2: Buy a VPN (we have chosen ipvanish).
VPN6: Log in to your account on your VPN.
VPN8: Choose a location this can be done by clicking the dropdown menu marked with red.
VPN9: Here can you choose the country you want to appear as e.g Denmark, Germany or India.
VPN10: The menu right below this can be used to choose a city but this is not as important as choosing the country so you can just leave it as is.
VPN12: When country is chosen click the green connect button.
VPN13: It will now appear as you are in your chosen country, you are now ready to look for cheaper prices.
